CustomField.formula: If (Period_AR__c + Period_Cured_AR__c + Period_WIP__c + Period_Cured_WIP__c + Period_Deferred_Income__c < 0, Period_AR__c + Period_Cured_AR__c + Period_WIP__c + Period_Cured_WIP__c + Period_Deferred_Income__c, 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the amount that will be reversed at the end of this month.
CustomField.label: Period Total Reversal
